# Number of lines of code in checkPolynomial: 6
sub checkPolynomial {
  my $self = shift; my ($l,$r) = ($self->{lop},$self->{rop});
  $self->SUPER::checkPolynomial;
  $self->{isPoly} = 6 if ($l->{isPoly}||0) >= 6;
  return 1;
}
